sourcesContent:
import { Button, Col, Card, Row, Form } from "react-bootstrap"
import { useState } from "react";
const AddAppointment = () => {
    let [toggleForm, setToggleForm] = useState(false);
     return(
        <>
         <Col md="8">
            <Card className="md-3">
                <Card.Header>
                    Add Appointment
                    <Button size="sm" className="small float-end" onClick={setToggleForm(!toggleForm)}>+</Button>
                </Card.Header>
                <Card.Body>
                    <Form>
                        <Row className="md-3">
                            <Form.Group as={Col}>
                                <Form.Label>First Name</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="First Name" />
                            </Form.Group>
                            <Form.Group as={Col}>
                                <Form.Label>Last Name</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Last Name" />
                            </Form.Group>
                            
                        </Row>
                            <Form.Group as={Col} className="md-3">
                                <Form.Label>Appointment Date</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control type="date" />
                            </Form.Group>
                            <Form.Group as={Col} className="md-3">
                                <Form.Label>Appointment Time</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control type="time" />
                            </Form.Group>
                            <Form.Group as={Col} className="md-3">
                                <Form.Label>Comments</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control as="textarea" placeholder="comments" />
                            </Form.Group>
                            <Button variant="primary">Submit</Button>
                    </Form>
                </Card.Body>
            </Card>
         </Col>
        </>
     )
}

export default AddAppointment;
